name: LD35 - World Dominator
description:
Embark on an epic quest to dominate the world and rid it of troublesome monsters. Get the kills, get the loot and don't die!

Never the same experience twice. Guaranteed.

FREE TIPS:

1. WATCH YOUR STAMINA! You'll slow down if it runs out.

2. BE WARY OF WEIGHT! Heavier equipment makes you slower.

3. HEAL UP! Only way to heal is to increase your vitality, so use your points sparingly.

4. TREASURE! Boss monsters drop treasure, but they are tougher and bigger.

5. COMMENT! If you find any problems in the game, leave a comment and it'll be fixed.

THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR PLAYING!
